pages.text: 78|1|tae puokke denhdaol knea ampi rueng avei
78|2|ku ampi damnoeng da saamkhan
78|3|del puokke kampoungte khvengkoumnit knea ampi vea .
78|4|te.  puokke kngte nung doeng .
78|5|te.  banteabmk puokke kngte nung doeng yeang chbasa .
78|6|tae yeung minban bangkeut phendei aoy mean santhan reabasmae
78|7|ning phnom teanglay chea bangkol snoeng te ryy
78|8|haey yeung ban bangkeut puok anakchea kou (brosa  ning srei) .
78|9|haey yeung ban bangkeut kar dek robsa puok anak toukchea kar chhb  samreak .
78|10|haey yeung ban bangkeut peloyb chea kar betbang .
78|11|haey yeung ban bangkeut pelothngai chea karorsanow .
78|12|haey yeung ban bangkeut mekh brapir chean da rungmoam now pileu  puok anak .
78|13|haey yeung ban bangkeut preahatity del mean ponlu cheng  chang .
78|14|haey yeung ban banhchouh pi dom popk nouv tukaphlieng sraochasrap  krob tikanleng .
78|15|daembi yeung nung b po  ch nh tamory vea nouv kreabthonhnhocheate ning  roukkhcheate krob braphet .
78|16|ning chamkar damnam del mean phleanouphl krob braphet .
78|17|pitabrakd nasa  thngai katsechakdei ku mean pelkamnt  chbasaleasa .
78|18|now thngai delke phlomtre  pelnoh puok anak nung mk(kan  kanleng chomnoumchomreah) chea krom  .
78|19|haey mekh nung trauv ke baekchamh  pelnoh vea mean tvear  cheachraen .
78|20|haey phnom teanglay trauv ban ke thveu aoy r baek chenhpi kanleng  robsa vea  haey vea rsat dauch thouli .
78|21|pitabrakd nasa  nork cheu han nam kuchea kanleng triem .
78|22|chea kanleng rsanow samreab puok del bampean .
78|23|daoy puokke rsanow tinoh chea rieng rhaut .
78|24|puokke min del skal rosacheate trachak now tinoh laey  haeyka kmean tukphoek der .
78|25|meante tuk kdaw  ning khtoh bonnaoh
78|26|chea kar tabasnang da sam hetophl bamphot .
78|27|pitabrakd nasa  puokke kuchea puok del min sangkhumthanung  chuob kar chomnoumchomreah laey .
78|28|themtang puokke ban bdeseth nung ayeat  robsa yeung  tiet phng .
78|29|haey avei  teangoasa yeung ban kttra vea touk nowknong  sievphow kamnttra( lav ho l mah hvou sa) ruoch chea se  r ch .
78|30|dau che  neah  chaur puok anak phloksa choh  haey yeung min banthem avei aoy puok  anak krawpi tearounakamm laey .
